## About

This page provides some general comments about the write-ups submitted for [Exercise 03](../exercises/ex03-making-data.qmd).

Please take these observations to heart and implement them in future assignments.

## Observations

1. The strongest papers included references to support specific points. It is *always* better to provide evidence if that evidence is available. If no external sources were used and you rely on your own opinions, please clarify this explicitly.

2. The strongest papers provided complete background and context to support and support specific arguments.

3. Unless the assignment specifies a different output format, adhere to the APA submission format closely, including a title page and references page.
